      • sendLQIRequest

        ZDO_MGMT_LQI_RSP sendLQIRequest(ZDO_MGMT_LQI_REQ request)
        Send LQI request cluster and wait for its response

        This method is used for the discovering of ZigBeeEndpoint

        Returns:
        the answer to the request or null in case of an error
        Since:
        0.7.0

      • addCustomEndpoint

        void addCustomEndpoint(java.lang.String endpointNumber,
                     java.lang.String profileID,
                     java.lang.String deviceID,
                     java.lang.String version,
                     java.lang.String inputClusters,
                     java.lang.String outputCluster)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is used for the creation of an virtual device on the dongle

        Note: a proper addAFMessageListner has to be register for answering to request coming from the network

        Since:
        0.7.0

      • getExtendedPanId

        long getExtendedPanId()
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The long representing the IEEE Address of coordinator of the ZigBee network in use, or -1 if and only if the method failed
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getIeeeAddress

        long getIeeeAddress()
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The long representing the IEEE Address of ZigBee device in use, or -1 if and only if the method failed
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getCurrentPanId

        int getCurrentPanId()
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The panId of ZigBee network configured in use, or -1 if and only if the method failed
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getCurrentChannel

        int getCurrentChannel()
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The ZigBee network channel in use, or -1 if and only if the method failed
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getCurrentState

        int getCurrentState()
        Deprecated. 
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The ZStack state of the device, or -1 if and only if the method failed

      • getZigBeeNodeMode

        int getZigBeeNodeMode()
        WARNING: This method may have to wait for the initialization of the ZigBee network thus, it may be quite slow or end up in a deadlock of the application
        Returns:
        The int representation of the NetworkMode in use, or -1 if and only if the method failed
        Since:
        0.6.0
